name: Theurgist

skills.name: Ice Debris
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meter for a random ally by 10%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Touch of Sealing
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1 ane

skills.name: Uplift
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff and a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
